definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: I wolfed the whole two pounds of bread without stopping to take breath.
sentences.chinese: 我狼吞虎咽地一口气把整整两磅面包干掉了。

sentences.english: After a fight, Max, but maggie off the killer was hijacked in go.
sentences.chinese: 经过一场搏斗，马克斯干掉了杀手，但玛吉却被劫走。

sentences.english: One Colossi will be able to kill a group of Marines with one sweep of its lasers.
sentences.chinese: 一个巨像的一次激光扫射可以干掉一队的机枪兵。

sentences.english: The tree gave off a massive burst of energy that killed Archimonde instantly.
sentences.chinese: 世界之树释放的巨大能量瞬间干掉了阿克蒙德。

sentences.english: We're gonna kill all you mother fuckers.
sentences.chinese: 我们将要把你们全部干掉。

sentences.english: Kill off the Goddamned cowards and we will have a nation of brave men.
sentences.chinese: 干掉所有狗日的胆小鬼，我们的国家将是勇士的天下。

sentences.english: And once nail polish dries out there’s not much that can be done to save it.
sentences.chinese: 如果一瓶指甲油干掉了，那你也没必要去保存它了。

sentences.english: Scratch one pillbox, " the lieutenant said."
Fully-charged Devourers will rip apart a large Scorpion army quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 完全充能的吞食者可以非常迅速的干掉大量的蝎子。

sentences.english: Gao Yishan one pulled out a gun to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 高义山一听便拿出枪把他干掉了。

sentences.english: I destroyed the old one in vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 作为报复，我干掉了那个老家伙。

sentences.english: As the sheets dry out, overlapping edges “felt” together to become fused seams.
sentences.chinese: 当薄片干掉以后，重叠的部分接合在一起。

sentences.english: The cow is determined to be a week to kill his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 牛德彩断定是周轶夫要干掉他的左右手。

sentences.english: The gang leader decided that the informer must be taken for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒头目决定要将告密者用汽车绑架去干掉。

sentences.english: If you find old Griswold, then you can take him down.
sentences.chinese: 如果你找到了老格里斯沃德，你可以把干掉。

sentences.english: He killed all of them, too.
sentences.chinese: 他又把他们也都干掉了。

definition: to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to handle/to deal with/to cope/to get by with
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to kill/to get rid of/(sports) to defeat/to eliminate
